data.title: A Hard Days Night (DVD, 2001, 2-Disc Set) for sale online
data.meta_description: Find many great new & used options and get the best deals for A Hard Days Night (DVD, 2001, 2-Disc Set) at the best online prices at eBay! Free shipping for many products!
data.text:
Great movie, but Miramax screwed this dvd!

We've seen this at midnight movies and loved it, so bought the dvd. Tried to watch this dvd and it's unwatchable! It required installing Miramax video viewer although all my other dvds play fine in my laptop, then the different playback options were not clickable, when we finally watched the first scene, it stops after every scene and we had to restart the dvd at the beginning of each and every scene. After 4 scenes it would not work at all, updating the Miramax player did not help. Would not buy again, searched and unfortunately the older copies are reviewed as poor quality copies.

Verified purchase: Yes | Condition: Pre-owned

Holds up well over time.

I wanted to show it to my highschool age kids because I remembered it being fun with lots of music. When we watched it together, they followed the story but we ran it with subtitles because of the scouse dialect. They thought it was fun the way the beatles seemed to improvise everything, and they groaned at many of the jokes. They said, "it's like a musical" when the songs came on, though the music didn't always relate to the action. They didn't think the hordes of screaming girls were unusual, although I said it seemed unprecedented at the time. They liked the songs, wondered who the individual players were, admired Paul's bass, and Ringo's stage manners. I enjoyed it again, but as an adult this time. I thought it was a cool promotional piece for a great group. With the passing of John and George, it seems like going through an old family album sort of.Read full review

Hard Days Night DVD

First disc had the original movie. The Beatles really did not have much of a script for the movie. Pretty much were themselves, I think, which was great to see. Second disc has a lot of good interviews with people behind the scenes who helped make the movie. They shared stories I had never heard before in the making of the movie.

Verified purchase: Yes | Condition: Pre-owned

Beatles A Har Daâ€™s Night.

The DVD was in great shape. The last time I watched this movie was years ago. It was much more fun to watch than I had remembered it had been. i had forgotten just how quick and clever all four Beatles could be with their comebacks to some of the strange questions asked by reporters.

Verified purchase: Yes | Condition: Pre-owned
